name: Gotcha! (itch)
description:
A Community Game Jam game where the player tries to pose the game as a liar. It's just a tutorial section, but what the game tells you to do, is not the only solution. You still do what you want to do.

Took me about 2-3 days of fixing bugs and trying out new things. This is my first jam with Unity.

Controls are arrow keys and shift to jump :) Jump high to avoid arrows and there are secret paths.

In order to see different endings, you must find all gotcha's or find none of them.

Known Bugs:
- Camera goes back and forth when staying in the middle of scenes. A bit intentional.
- If you don't play on fullscreen, some text is out of screen. That's on my part, sorry.
- An audio glitch in HTML5. I don't know why that happens...
